description:
FibriCheck Camera SDK for iOS applications.  
The iOS Camera SDK allows developers to integrate FibriCheck's heart rhythm analysis technology into a mobile iOS application. The SDK interfaces with the smartphone camera and generates a raw PPG signal and a heart rate estimation in beats per minute.
This SDK only implements data acquisition functionality and should be used in conjunction with the FibriCheck Cloud. This SDK does not offer any stand-alone rate or rhythm diagnostic capabilities.
name: ios-camera-sdk
